posts.message:
تفتكروا فى شبكة تواصل اجتماعى مصرية تقدر تنافس الفيسبوك بطريقه جديدة ؟
تفتكروا فى شركة هدفها خيرى ومجتمعى تقدر تستمر وتكسب فلوس ؟

تعرف على شركة 
NasHope
ناس هوب هيا شبكة تواصل اجتماعى وحلول تقنية للمجتمع المدنى 

مين يقدر يسجل فى ناس هوب
اى حد عايز يعمل خير او يتطوع
اى جمعية اهلية عايزه توصل لمتبرعين او متطوعين
اى طالب عايز يوصل للانشطة الطلابية فى جامعتة
اى شركة عايزه تفيد المجتمع
و كمان ممكن المطورين يطوروا برامج تفيد المجتمع 
الدعوات محدودة .. سارع بالتسجيل
www.nashope.com

#لسه_فى_أمل
#اكتشف_مجتمعك

https://www.facebook.com/NasHopeOfficial

posts.caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

PiTechnologies Company is hiring for "Android developer" :

Responsibilities:
- Design and build advanced applications for the Android platform
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
- Work with outside data sources and API's
- Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.
- Work with Social media APi's integration
- Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
- Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development
efficiency.

Qualifications:
- BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject
- 2+ years of software development experience
- 1+ years of Android development
- Have published at least one original Android app
- Experience with Android SDK
- Experience working with remote data via JSON
- Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
- Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies.
- Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle.
- IOS development knowledge "PLUS”
- Web development knowledge (PHP / MySQL) "PLUS”
- Can work on Linux OS "PLUS"

For who see himself/herself able to get this opportunities, please send your CV with subject (ADP02) to (rania.afifi@pitechnologies.net)
evernote.com
posts.description: Our vision is to help the world remember everything. Come work with us.

posts.caption:
PiTechnologies Company is hiring for "Web Developer"

Education:
B.S. or M.S. Computer Science or related field.

Qualifications:
- 2+ years of experience.
- Experience working with PHP in a web environment ( Required )
- Object Oriented programming with PHP (Required)
- Experience in one of the major MVC frameworks like (CodeIgniter, Symphony) or other Frameworks. ( Required )
- Experience working with Linux system and open source technologies! (Required)
- Working knowledge of web application security (Required)
- Expertise in configuration and maintenance of MySQL (Required)
- HTML, HTML5, JavaScript, JQuery, and CSS skills ( Required )
- Experience working with APIs Like ( Google, Facebook,Twitter, Ebay, Paypal … )
- Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
- Able to work under pressure and deadlines
- Organized and punctual
- Capable of independent thought and research
- Able to set personal deadlines and meet them.
- Creative approach to problem solving

Candidate should set the subject to (WDI14) (other subjects will be ignored) CVs should be sent to (abdelrahman.mohamed@pitechnologies.net)

posts.message: شباب Intel قفلت فرعها فى مصر

Why is Rundll32 called Rundll32 and not just Rundll?

http://blogs.msdn.com/b/oldnewthing/archive/2014/04/08/10515006.aspx
posts.caption: blogs.msdn.com
posts.description: There is an oft-abused program named rundll32.exe. Why does its name end in 32? Why not just call it rundll.exe? (I will for the moment ignore the rude behavior of calling people stupid under the guise of asking a question.)
